Error Details Error de Detalles Message for publication stopped for licensing issues. You have either exceeded your license limits or have an inactive license and simply need to register. Please return to the License Monitor on the Dashboard to resolve this issue. To upgrade your license contact a sales rep at sales@percussion.com or 800.283.0800. Thank you. Usted ha excedido los límites de su licencia o tiene una licencia inactiva y simplemente necesita registrarse. Vuelva al Monitor de licencia en el panel de control para resolver este problema. Para actualizar su licencia, póngase en contacto con un representante de ventas en sales@percussion.com o 01+800.283.0800. Gracias. Message for publication stopped for configuration issues.
